title: I05-5004

sentences.text: Towards deep analysis of compositional classes of paraphrases , we have examined a class-oriented framework for collecting paraphrase examples , in which sentential paraphrases are collected for each paraphrase class separately by means of automatic candidate generation and manual judgement .
Our preliminary experiments on building a paraphrase corpus have so far been producing promising results , which we have evaluated according to cost-efficiency , exhaustiveness , and reliability .

summary: Towards deep analysis of compositional classes of paraphrases , we have examined a class-oriented framework for collecting paraphrase examples , in which sentential paraphrases are collected for each paraphrase class separately by means of automatic candidate generation and manual judgement . Our preliminary experiments on building a paraphrase corpus have so far been producing promising results , which we have evaluated according to cost-efficiency , exhaustiveness , and reliability .
kg2text: Our preliminary experiments on building a paraphrase corpus have so far been producing promising results. This research has examined a class-oriented framework, which suggests that our broader approach to collecting paraphrase examples has yielded positive outcomes.
